# UITableView.Style.grouped

**Case**

A table view where sections have distinct groups of rows.

## Declaration

```swift
case grouped
```

## Discussion

Section headers and footers don’t float when the table view scrolls.

## Styles

- **UITableView.Style.plain**: A plain table view.
- **UITableView.Style.insetGrouped**: A table view where the grouped sections are inset with rounded corners.

items.description: A table view where the grouped sections are inset with rounded corners.
